name: Food Truck Simulator - Wowie Edition
description:
A little bit of background...

This game was made for the Wowie Jam 2.0!
I was working on this game for like 8 hours when a real bug hitted me: temperature!
And it was VERY HIGH, i tried to work but of course it was impossible due to the "feel like garbage" status.
So, yes, it looks not polished yet...it happens! (DAMN)

I hope you will enjoy the game anyway :).

PS: the theme of the Jam was "Intentional Bugs".  

Controls

WASD
Move - srsly?

LEFT CONTROL
Crouch - okay that's interestin

MOUSE MOVEMENT
Look around - OMG TOTALLY UNEXPECTED

LEFT CLICK (hold)
Grab things and move them around - let's have physics based fun!

ESC
Pause or exit - trust me: use ALT + F4 because this game is very buggy...

How to make a tasty burger!

  1. Open the frige
  2. Grab a patty
  3. Put the patty on the grill
  4. Grab a piece of bread butt (seriously) and release it on the plate in the counter
  5. Grab a salad
  6. Wash the salad
  7. Grab a tomato
  8. Wash the tomato
  9. Cut tomato and salad with knife
  10. Release the patty on the plate
  11. Release a salad piece on the plate
  12. Release a tomato slice on the plate
  13. Release the bread hat (wot?) on the plate
  14. YAY! You made money!
  15. Make more patties (every time an ingredient spawns, it cost you money)
